location: Tingzhou Road Section 3, near Taipei Power Building MRT Station (193m), near Yingqiao Middle School (108m)
notes: Spacious 4BR/2BA apartment on 1F with elevator access. Baby-friendly features: ground floor access, cooking allowed, pet-friendly landlord suggests flexibility. Includes full amenities (AC, washer, fridge, furniture) and parking. Near MRT and schools which is convenient. Cannot assess modern condition or safety features without photos - recommend in-person visit to check balcony railings and floor condition.
